values:
so i always forget to do this damn thing....i just havent had time.... i work like crazy...and i did have school...but were done with that.... IM A SENIOR!! WOOO!!! 1 more year baby and its off to college...wow...that seems sooo weird...but cool. Jana and I still date. it was 3 months yesterday..which was very cool. i love that girl.  

So i got drunk not that long ago...pretty weird huh!?!?! yeah...graduation party....but it wasnt my fault! Jana's mom gave me alot..and i mean ALOT of wine. and after that me and jana went out to this huge ass party and i got wasted haha. sooo..yep. haha. fun times. 

By Those Beneath...yeah...we lost our drummer. So now we are looking for another one..and were not having any luck. damnit. 

anyways im really tired..just saw 12 Gauge Valentine. GREAT BAND. They rocked it. Im out. PEACE!
http://before-you-burn.livejournal.com/8162.html

man... i hate school. Right now im doing a gay term paper for english...and my teacher is a bitch. Sometime schools seems so pointless..but then other times its pretty cool to learn new things. OH!!!! i have a new g/f...she is amaaazzzing!! her name is Jana Saxon. tomorrow will be out 1 month snice we dated. She is very sweet, beautiful, caring, funny, outgoing, and just a great person. I know i can trust her. I hope she can trust me. I really hope we continue this relationship...but...she goes to college in august i think.... hmmm....  well... im tired...sorry...im out. ttyl.
http://before-you-burn.livejournal.com/7757.html

what up. i just kinda got up..its 11:40. Right now im just listening to music..waiting to have band practice. then i got gaayyyy work. blah. so me and kim broke up...it just wasnt working out...i hardly got to see her...and im just really stressed from work and school and band and everything. so it was kinda like both of us wanted to do it. so it wasnt bad. i still love her and shes an awesome girl...i just need time off and focus on school and stuff. 

sooo yeah... im a big music freak now. Right now im studying music theory on guitar. I want to go to a music school and just do everything on guitar. Thats all me and rob talk about..is Music. its not about the fashion...its about the passion. We want our band to be sooo tech. and oringal..i cant wait when we start righting our new material. 

well..ill keep trying to update this thing for ya. byeee..
http://before-you-burn.livejournal.com/7560.html

well well...im back. Haven't did this thing in almost a year. hahaha. Well..ALOT has happened...too much for me to write down. Well..the girl i always used to write about..meg. yeah well me and her broke up around august. Then i started dating a girl named Leilani..we broke up after a month. And now im dating a girl named Kim. Shes awesome. anywho..... On My Honor is broken up...yeah...we broke up after i got drunk and got sent to the hospital. But me, Jeff, and Rob started something up with Chad Johnson and Alex Blackwell. We are called By Those Beneath..and we are alot different than on my honor. Hardcore mixed with Ambeince type stuff. Alot of people like us..and all those guys are my Family. 

Lets see...School sucks...like always. I have alot more friends from myrtle beach than i ever did ha. I stoped smoking and drinking because it was gettin out of control. I really dont have any friends that go to waccamaw...so...oh well. People said i have changed a whole lot. Snice ive updated this thing i sure think i did haha. i would put a picture of me up on here..but i dont know how to do it..blah..

So now... Im sick. I have mono. damn you dorothy. ha. and im really upset.... My good friends funeral was today..and i couldnt go... Eylse Anderson. Man..im gona miss her sooo much. We had some crazy times together..and where ever you are eylse..i just want you to know that i love you and i will see you soon. And you too Troy D. Conroy..my friend that died in 8th grade...i love you man.

well..i think thats it..im gona try to update this thing as much as i can...later.
http://before-you-burn.livejournal.com/7371.html

ok yeah..so i havent written in this thing for quite some time. I just keep on forgeting. EEEHHHHHHHHHHHH...so whats been goin on with me? err..ehh..nothing really. ive been the same. my birthday is comin up. woo hoo. I have a show on my birthday..me and the fam arent gona do anything because we have no money, so they let me just go and play a show..were pretty damn poor. but oh well..whatcha gona do. Meggie came over today..which was fun! i beat her down..cause she thought she could take me..ha..in her dreams..but i still love her anyways haha.. Well im pretty tired..im out. Lates.

LOVE YA MEG!!!!!!!!!!!
http://before-you-burn.livejournal.com/7149.html

yeah sorry i havent updated this piece..ive been pretty busy. Well theres nothing really going on...i got in a fight with my rents last night...they made me feel like im a disappointment and a failure. But im good now. Im just in a "confused" stage right now. Eh..i dunno. Today i slept most of the day away. My dad took me out to find a job again..but before we left Mereideth, Emmad, and Brendon came over and they wanted me to come ride around with them. But i had to leave with my dad. When i got back i called mereideth and told me she could pick me up..so they all came back around 7:00 and i just chilled over emmadds house until 9:30. now im just here. *sigh* ok well im gona go. PEACE.
http://before-you-burn.livejournal.com/6706.html

Yo

I havent written in this thing for a long time..but right now im gona go do my h/w..and yeah..so im out..ill write in this tommorow..love ya meg! Peace
http://before-you-burn.livejournal.com/6556.html

ok well its 11:10 in the monring right now..and im writeing in it now cause i didnt write last night..and just because i feel like writeing in it now.

Well last night was very awesome. So around 2:30 chris came and picked me up, and me, kyle, and sally went to the salvation army store. we bought a few things. Then we picked up Rob and Jessica at robs house. Then we went to kyles for a bit. After kyles we went to chris's and just hung out there for a bit. Before i go any futher..Last night we played at a party..and we had to be there at 7. It was a good friend my mine, Annelisa..shes pretty cool. But yes. back to when we were at chris's. I called jeremy to see if i could use his stack, cause the marshall was bein real gay. So he said yeah sure. So then me, chris, kyle, sally, rob, and jessica all went to jeremys. Well..first the van wouldnt start..soo we had to use chris's car to jump it. and man that was a project. So nick came when we were trying to jump the car. and he was helping us. we finally got it and we left for jeremys house.

So then nick stayed at chris's while we went to jeremys house. We got at jeremys house and NO one was there. so we were waiting for him for like a half hour 45 minutes. Then the van goes out on us. we couldnt get it to start again. which fuckin sucked..and jeremy was still not there! so then we called nick and he came to jump the van with his car. he called Laine to just to come ha. it still wouldnt work..but then 1 last try and it worked!!! we all started danceing and yelling and shit lol. so we couldnt wait for jeremy any more so we left. But when we were just goin by we saw his car pull up..so we jeted back and got his stack real quick. He had to go with his mom somewhere cause his g/f was over and his mom didnt want them two alone at his house. soo he was really sorry and pissed. So we jeted back to chris's house and started to pack all our amps and equipment real quick. it was like...6:45 we when got to chris's and was packing..i called meg i told her to real fast get to chris's..so we had everything packed at like 6:55..and meg just got there right when we were about to leave. wooo!!!

So we got to the party and we just made it. it was awesome! All the other bands were great! and ALOT of peolpe were there and it was just awesome. alot of peolpe from Low country and a few from waccamaw. Everyone liked us so i that ver cool. We played and we FUCKED SHIT UP!! lol. Annelisa's parents gave us 200 dollars as well for playing! Annelisa is like...really really rich..cause her party was at Litchfeild by the Sea...which is like..REALLY expensive..and she goes to a private school and shit..so yeah..pretty rich. But yes..last night was very fun.  

Well..i think im gona go..i dont think im gona sign it tonight cause i cant go out..and im just gona stay in and watch the superbowl. i was suppose to go to the Boys Night Out, The Beautiful Mistake, Moneen, and Senses Fail show. but i wont be back til like 3 or 4 in the morning..so i cant go. oh well. im out..LATER

I LOVE YOU MEG!
http://before-you-burn.livejournal.com/6264.html

really..it is..im freezing..but yeah anyways..

today, January 29th, is 5 months. me and meg! lol we hung out today and went to applebee's haha. good stuff. well right now im doin nothing. Playin guitar..Listenin to some For Dire Lifes Sake. Crazy band. anyways..i think im out..sooooooo later.

Meg..i love you. Dont you ever forget that.
http://before-you-burn.livejournal.com/6143.html
man..i hate myself. i dunno whats wrong with me..but i feel bad right now. i really dont want to talk about it..but yeah..im out. cya.
http://before-you-burn.livejournal.com/5835.html

well..nothing good happened today..we had a 2 hour delay from school..and tommorow as well. woo! and i had a guitar lesson. good stuff. well i have to finish this paper..or im gona die. cya.

I LOVE YOU MEG! SOOOOOO MUCH!!
http://before-you-burn.livejournal.com/5558.html

Ok Ok..i didnt update my jounral last night cause i was out. So last night was suppose to be winter ball thing..but it got cancelled. Sooo me, meg, tanner, josh, austin, liz, and chlo all went out to dinner at my old work..Old World Italian Restruant. It was really good..i forgot how good that place was. Then after dinner we went bowling..that was fun. But the plan was..me, chlo and liz were gona sleep over megs house..but chlo and liz went to the bathroom in the bowling ally and got drunk. which was pretty damn shitty of them. so they didnt sleep over. Megs mom was pretty mad about that but she didnt find out that they were drunk..meg told her that they got in a fight.

So after bowling everyone got droped home. and i spent the night with meg. which i liked very much. i was kind glad that liz and chlo didnt sleep over. Well we got at megs around 1:30 or something..and we were freakin tired. but we watched tv for a little bit then i had to sleep upstairs and she slept'd in her room. i didnt care though. In the morning she came upstiars and woke me in bed..and she was right next to me..which was great lol. So then me and meg made breakfast. i made some pancakes..then she made some eggs. then we made bacon. it was awesome! lol

so then after breakfast we just watched tv and talked..we couldnt go outside cause today was just rain. and it was like 20 degrees out. i came home around 2:30 and meg stayed here til like 4:30 and then..thats about it what happened last night and today. Well tommorow..school. not cool. Oh Well. Im out. PEACE!

I LOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOVVVVVVVVVVVEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE MEG!
http://before-you-burn.livejournal.com/5350.html

Well..i its friday..and i was suppose to go out tonight with the fella's..but noooooo!

chris called and said he was gona go out tonight and said he was gona pick me up..so i told him to call me later on tonight. So theni told my mom i really wanted to do something tonight. and i said i was gona go to sleep. and if anyone calls..wake me. so meg calls and i really wanted to talk to her about tommorow. but no..my mom doesnt wake me. then like right after she called..chris calls. but does my mom wake me..no! fuckin shit man..its friday..and im sittin in my fuckin house..FJwtu94wy4t99h443nn4n834600nb40n3469 sometimes i just hate my parents. FUCK!!!! well im out..im just to fuckin pissed. cya.

I LOVE MEG!
http://before-you-burn.livejournal.com/5073.html

yoooo

well today is alright. but in school today i had a big anxiety attack or something..cause right after first block. we went to the autotoruim for a test thing. and we got are scores back and i started freakin out. i did good and everything not GREAT but pretty good. i did better than alot of other people. but still we were talking about all the testes and stuff..and i just started freakin out..like shakeing and sweating and dizzyness. but it went away after 3rd block. but yeah i dunno why that happened..just thinking about all that shit makes me scared for some reason.

Well..thursday. Superstitions of the sky, Dearly Departed, and Farewell To Arms. its gona be CRAZY. 

Well Saturday is Winter Ball. its gona be really fun..but im gona go..ill talk more about it tommorow. LATERRRRR

I LOVVVVVEEEEEEEEE MEG!!!
http://before-you-burn.livejournal.com/4688.html

Howdy.

Yeah today was pretty fun. woke up around 9:00 and went to chris's house for band practice around 10:00. then Jennie, Laine, Kyle, Megan, Sally came over. so after we practiced, Me, Chris, Rob, Jessica, Kyle, Jennie, Laine, Megan, Brionna, And Sally all went to charleston for the whole day. i had to ride with Jennie, Megan, Laine, and Brionna. haha cause rob and kyle called to ride with chris ha. But yeah..we all listend to rap music to represent Martin Luther! it was crazy. i felt all gangsta. Damn it feels good to be a gangsta. haha crazy song.

When we arrived in Charleston we went to eat some pizza. Then we went to 52.5. Great music store. Got some cd's. then we left there and just walked around town for a bit. then we left and went to manifest music. thats a even better music store. that place has anything. you name it..they have it. got a couple more cds there. Then we left around..6:00 and went to go get some ice cream. we got at chris's around..8:30ish. then i got home like around 9:30. so yeah..today was pretty damn fun. but noooooo Meg C. Kelly couldnt come. MAN!! oh well..tommorow were goin to see peter pan beotch!!

yeah well im out. im gona go relax and watch a movie. Peace out!

-Kirk
P.s - i love you meg!

Today is friday. whoo! it was a long ass week. so glad no school til tuesday. but yeah...it was pretty good. i fell asleep at like 4:30 and woke up at like 7:45 haha. i wanted to do something tonight but theres really nothing to do. Meg went over chloe's house. so i couldnt do anything with her tonight. :-(

oh man. Concert. 22nd. were playin with Superstitions of the sky beocth! its gona be INSANE!!!!!

Oh shit. Chappelle Show. Season 2! Wed. at 10:30! haha hell yeah.

hmmm..well theres really nothing else to say to i guess im out. HoLlA!

yeah but anyways...im about to pass out...soooo ill cya.

Well..i think im out. HOLLA!

YOOOOOOO. yeah so today was fun. Meg Colleen Kelly came over. First we played Vice City..shes pretty good at it haha. Then we went for a walk and that was cool cause we found this trail..and like we heard this kids screaming in the distance..so we became like secret agent people and snuck over to see what was going on haha. it was fun. i wanna go back there and spy some more sometime ha. then we came back to my house..ate dinner..and watched some tv. it was very fun. ahh, i love her. well thats basically all that went down today..right now im just watchin some tv..so yeah im out.

WOOO.

yeah so today colin was here til around 3:30. We were playin vice city like ALL day and last night to. good stuff. but yeah, me and colin went to north litchfeild. We stoped by jermeys house but he wasnt there cause he was with caitlin. but bobby, larry, and marshall were there. it was sooo fuckin funny. cause a bird got in the house! haha. so we had to catch the damn thing. It first was in J-mans room. and we had towels and everything and all of the sudden...the bird just starts flying all crazy and hit my chest. I open the door and it flew out and then went in the laundry room. so were still trying to catch it. Then Marshall all the sudden just hits the bird in the air. it was insane. we thought the bird was dead..but he wasnt. we let it outside. it didnt fly at first but we waited and it flew off. touching i know. Then me, colin, marshall, larry, and bobby just watched some surfing movies.

When we left there, Colin left. so i had to clean up the room and shit. my parents picked up Meg and they took us to the movies. i was soooooo happy to see her and shes just great to hang with. shes just a great girlfriend..bottom line. We saw Lord Of The Rings, and that is a long ass movie but its really a great movie. i got home around..11:00ish. and now im watchin hook. bad ass movie man.

well im out. PEACE

                                                  I-Love-Meg

PS: sorry about the last entrie..it went through twice or some shit. ha.
